title: Cap Store
content: **Frontend--->** Building a responsive React project with Tailwind CSS , Firebase , JWT , and Axios for seamless authentication and API integration
**Backend--->**The backend of the project is developed using Node.js , Express.js for creating robust APIs, MongoDB for database management, and CORS to handle cross-origin requests efficiently.

**Other Tools--->** Integrating additional tools like GitHubfor version control, Vercel/strong>for deployment, AOS animation for enhancing UI interactions, and **DaisyUI** for pre-styled Tailwind components.
I'm also working on making the website responsive.

title: Coffee Store
content: **Frontend--->** I am working with Html CSS , JavaScript , React , and Firebase to build dynamic and interactive applications, focusing on efficiently displaying and managing dynamic data
**Backend--->** On the backend side, I am working with **MongoDB**, **Express.js**, **CORS**, and related technologies to develop robust server-side functionality.

**Other Tools--->** Integrating additional tools like **GitHub** for version control, **Vercel** for deployment, **AOS animation** for enhancing UI interactions, and **DaisyUI** for pre-styled Tailwind components.
I'm also working on making the website responsive.

title: Byte Blaze
content: **Frontend--->** I am utilizing **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, **React**, to create dynamic and interactive applications, with a focus on efficiently managing and displaying real-time data.
**Backend--->**i am using **JSON** for data collection, implementing **dynamic routes**, and working with **real-time APIs** that deliver frequently updated news, changing day by day.
**Other Tools--->** Integrating additional tools like **GitHub** for version control, **Vercel** for deployment, , and **DaisyUI** & **Mambba UI** for pre-styled Tailwind components.
I'm also working on making the website responsive.
